episodes.description: When the guys split a winning lottery ticket, they are stunned when Carl disappears with the money.

episodes.title: Dangers On a Train
episodes.description: Marge tries to buy Homer cakes for their anniversary, but meets a married man who loves British TV.

episodes.title: Homerland
episodes.description: Homer returns from a trip a different man from when he left--which greatly disturbs Lisa.

episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror XXIV
episodes.description: The scariest Simpsons Halloween show yet, featuring an opening by Guillermo Del Toro.

episodes.title: Four Regrettings and a Funeral
episodes.description: At the funeral of a beloved man we've never met, Homer, Marge, Burns and Brockman express regrets.

episodes.title: YOLO
episodes.description: Homer learns he'll only live once, and a pen pal from his youth helps him live life to its fullest.

episodes.title: Labor Pains
episodes.description: Homer helps deliver a baby in an elevator and grows close to the child.

episodes.title: The Kid Is All Right
episodes.description: Lisa makes a new best friend--who turns out to be as conservative as Lisa is liberal.

episodes.title: Yellow Subterfuge
episodes.description: When Bart is denied a field trip on a navy sub, Homer plots revenge on Skinner.

episodes.title: White Christmas Blues
episodes.description: When Springfield is the only town with snow at Christmas, Marge turns the Simpson home into a B&B.

episodes.title: Steal This Episode
episodes.description: Homer gets into the movie piracy business.

episodes.title: Married to the Blob
episodes.description: Comic book guy goes on a date.

episodes.title: Specs and the City
episodes.description: Burns gives out "smart glasses" that enable him to spy on his employees, while Bart defies Nelson.

episodes.title: The Man Who Grew Too Much
episodes.description: Lisa campaigns against genetically modified organisms, and the Simpsons meet an old foe.

episodes.title: Diggs
episodes.description: Bart befriends a boy (Daniel Radcliffe) and his falcon.

episodes.title: The Winter of His Content
episodes.description: Marge gets a glimpse into the future.

episodes.title: The War of Art
episodes.description: Homer and Marge are accused of being art thieves.

episodes.title: You Don't Have to Live Like a Referee
episodes.description: Lisa declares Homer her hero, but he must prove himself while refereeing at the World Cup.

episodes.title: Luca$
episodes.description: Lisa meets a boy who dreams of becoming a competitive eater.

episodes.title: Days of Future Future
episodes.description: 30 years in the future Lisa is married to a zombie and Homer is just a face on a screen.

episodes.title: What to Expect When Bart's Expecting
episodes.description: When Bart puts a curse on a teacher, she gets pregnant and childless couples turn to him for help.

episodes.title: Brick Like Me
episodes.description: In the Simpsons' 550th episode, Homer enters a blocky world of dreams.

episodes.title: Pay Pal
episodes.description: Marge wants couples friends, but Homer destroys their chances.

episodes.title: The Yellow Badge of Cowardge
episodes.description: At field day, Bart undergoes a test of courage that he fails miserably.

episodes.title: Clown in the Dumps
episodes.description: A death in Springfield has serious repercussions.

episodes.title: The Wreck of the Relationship
episodes.description: Bart and Homer stage a titanic battle over eating a piece of broccoli.

episodes.title: Super Franchise Me
episodes.description: Marge manages a fast-food sandwich franchise and soon finds the whole family must help out.

episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror XXV
episodes.description: Bart goes to school in Hell, and the house is haunted by the Tracey Ullman Show Simpsons.

episodes.title: Opposites A-Frack
episodes.description: The Simpsons discover Mr. Burns has been extracting oil from the ground below their water supply.

episodes.title: Simpsorama
episodes.description: The long-awaited Simpsons/Futurama crossover.

episodes.title: Blazed and Confused
episodes.description: Bart gets a psychotic new teacher. The Simpsons find themselves trapped at a poor man's Burning Man.

episodes.title: Covercraft
episodes.description: Homer forms a cover band with other dads in the neighborhood.

episodes.title: I Won't Be Home for Christmas
episodes.description: I Won’t Be Home for Christmas.

episodes.title: The Man Who Came to Be Dinner
episodes.description: The Simpsons visit the home planet of aliens Kang and Kodos.

episodes.title: Bart's New Friend
episodes.description: Homer regresses to the mind of a ten year old and becomes Bart's best friend.

episodes.title: The Musk Who Fell to Earth
episodes.description: Tesla founder Elon Musk lands in Springfield and magically transforms the town into a dystopia.

episodes.title: Walking Big & Tall
episodes.description: A group of wide priders teach Homer it's okay to be plus sized.

episodes.title: My Fare Lady
episodes.description: Marge starts driving for pay but runs afoul of Springfield's cabbies.

episodes.title: The Princess Guide
episodes.description: Moe befriends a Nigerian princess whose father has come to make a uranium deal with Mr. Burns.

episodes.title: Sky Police
episodes.description: The First Church of Springfield turns to card counting to make money.

episodes.title: Waiting for Duffman
episodes.description: When Springfield's resident Duffman is forced to retire, Homer is thrilled to get the job.

episodes.title: Peeping Mom
episodes.description: When Marge suspects Bart isn't being honest with her, she becomes a relentless mother.

episodes.title: The Kids Are All Fight
episodes.description: Four-year-old Bart and two-year-old Lisa can't stop fighting, much to their parents' dismay.

episodes.title: Let's Go Fly a Coot
episodes.description: Members of Grampa's World War II unit attempt to teach Homer respect for his father.

episodes.title: Bull-E
episodes.description: Marge's attempt to ban bullying lands half the town in jail.

episodes.title: Mathlete's Feat
episodes.description: Springfield Elementary loses its electronic devices and becomes a Waldorf school.

episodes.title: Every Man's Dream
episodes.description: Homer and Marge have a trial separation.

episodes.title: 'Cue Detective
episodes.description: Homer competes in a smoke-off.

episodes.title: Puffless
episodes.description: Marge's sisters quit smoking; Maggie befriends the animals on the roof.

episodes.title: Halloween of Horror
episodes.description: In this "real" Halloween episode the Simpsons go to a terrifying theme park.

episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror XXVI
episodes.description: Sideshow Bob finally kills Bart.

episodes.title: Friend with Benefit
episodes.description: Homer likes Lisa's new friend more than she does.

episodes.title: Lisa with an 'S'
episodes.description: Lisa becomes a broadway baby.

episodes.title: 'Paths of Glory
episodes.description: Lisa tries to save the reputation of a local female inventor.

episodes.title: Barthood
episodes.description: Bart goes from boyhood to manhood.

episodes.title: The Girl Code
episodes.description: Lisa creates artificial intelligence when she designs her own app.

episodes.title: Teenage Mutant Milk-Caused Hurdles
episodes.description: Bart grows a starter mustache and gets a crush on his new teacher.

episodes.title: Much Apu About Something
episodes.description: Apu loses the Kwiik-E-Mart to his nephew.

episodes.title: Love Is in the N2-O2-Ar-Co2-Ne-He-Ch4
